H0.text: What island is shared by Haiti and the Dominican Republic. Hispaniola

H1.text: What island is shared by Haiti and the Dominican Republic. Santo Domingo

H2.text: What island is shared by Haiti and the Dominican Republic. Saint Domingue

H3.text: What island is shared by Haiti and the Dominican Republic. Kiskeya

A4.text: Hispaniola is the second-largest island in the Caribbean... divided into two separate sovereign countries: the Spanish-speaking Dominican Republic... and the French and Haitian Creoleâ€“speaking Haiti...

A5.text: the island of Hispaniola, which until then was most commonly called Santo Domingo, began to be widely identified as Haiti...

A6.text: Hispaniola is shared by the Dominican Republic and Haiti

A7.text: Hispaniola is one of only two islands in the Caribbean shared by two sovereign states
